attributes.action: take back the decision to knight Salam Rushdie by the British government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Salman Rushdie has been knighted by the British government. He is the author of the highly offensive Satanic Verses in which he insults Islam and all our beloved Prophets (Peace Be Upon Them). What good has he done to deserve this knighthood?

Please sign this petition urging the Prime Minister to reconsider this decision and rectify the mistake made by his government.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Rushdie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
